divs: sighting detailsmy son called me outside at 8:34 pm to the back yard to look at a jet airplane traveling ne - nw when i saw a cigar shaped craft (a thin dark tube with tapered ends encompased with white convex side edges) that moved slowly in a straight line 85 deg. n - ne in a clear blue sky for 5 - 10 sec > 1000 ft. without lights or any sound. the craft was ~ 1\2 inch at arms length and its colors (edges) were slightly transparent. i went inside to get binoculars and lost sight of the object as it traveled ne when returning to the back yard.
